column5: I live in the chatham kent area and have fished steelies in erie. I want to turn it up a notch and get a group together for the big O. Looking for a good charter out of the GTA for some big kings and also some suggestions on time to book. Thanks

Look at Fish Masters, a member here and a great record of guiding. If no fish he will give a great rate for a second trip. The days of guaranteed fish are long gone. He goes out of St. Catherines this time of year. Then Erie for our monster Walleye latter in the summer I believe.
niagarafishingservices.com  Mr Rohr has my vote.   Got me hooked on kings a few years back.    But if it's solely big kings look out of buffers or Whitby in July August.
We get our fill of big walleyes this way. Looking for a chance at some kings.
Ryan @ We Poundem will put you on fish.  Great guy, awesome boat, always on the fish.   You can find him on Facebook.  https://www.wepoundemfishing.com/

niagarafishingservices.com  Mr Rohr has my vote. Got me hooked on kings a few years back. But if it's solely big kings look out of buffers or Whitby in July August.  What he said, very good guy.  Been around since dirt was invented and infantrymen were crusaders with sandals and spears.

Can always look at Lloyd from U & ME Guide Service.  He has a FB page and posted here may a time too.  His posts are not of charter days when he posts but his own fun days with the boys when he was posting here.
Lower lake Huron has some great salmon fishing and is a lot closer to you,may not have the numbers or size of Lake ontario but some good fishing none the less.
Can't even compare the two fisheries.  Night and day in my opinion.
That is also an option, if you have any recommendations for a Huron charter id consider it. Thanks

That is also an option, if you have any recommendations for a Huron charter id consider it. Thanks try maitland valley fishing charters. Heard they are doing good for lakers.  Dave is a great guy.  tell him Ali from toronto sent you. he is based out of goderich.

Can always look at Lloyd from U & ME Guide Service.  He has a FB page and posted here may a time too.  His posts are not of charter days when he posts but his own fun days with the boys when he was posting here. he is one of the best, and its is always a fun time on the water with Lloyd
